text: photons are the packets of energy our

charged particles absorb each other's
light
and this draws the particles together
this attractive force is known as

not hold together if it weren't for

also causes atoms to stick together

responsible for the very structure of
our matter atoms holding together

interactions and therefore they're bound
together by light
the universe without electromagnetism

if electromagnetism was turned off

everything would just move fall apart

rest of you are doing
electromagnetism not only holds

when you touch something that's the

the reason I don't fall through the
